mapper.insert: insert into bi_category (CATE_NO, CATE_DIVISION_NAME, CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL, CATE_SECTION_NAME, CATE_SECTION_LEVEL, CATE_VALUE, CATE_AUTH_NO) values (bi_category_seq.nextval, #{CATE_DIVISION_NAME}, #{CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL}, #{CATE_SECTION_NAME}, #{CATE_SECTION_LEVEL}, #{CATE_VALUE}, #{CATE_AUTH_NO})
mapper.select: select CATE_NO, CATE_DIVISION_NAME, CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL, CATE_SECTION_NAME, CATE_SECTION_LEVEL, CATE_VALUE, CATE_AUTH_NO from (select CATE_NO, CATE_DIVISION_NAME, CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL, CATE_SECTION_NAME, CATE_SECTION_LEVEL, CATE_VALUE, CATE_AUTH_NO from bi_category where cate_division_name = #{value} order by cate_section_level desc ) where rownum = 1
select CATE_NO, CATE_DIVISION_NAME, CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL, CATE_SECTION_NAME, CATE_SECTION_LEVEL, CATE_VALUE, CATE_AUTH_NO from bi_category where CATE_NO = #{value}

select CATE_NO, CATE_DIVISION_NAME, CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL, CATE_SECTION_NAME, CATE_SECTION_LEVEL, CATE_VALUE, CATE_AUTH_NO from bi_category where CATE_DIVISION_NAME = #{value} order by CATE_SECTION_LEVEL, CATE_SECTION_LEVEL
select CATE_NO, CATE_DIVISION_NAME, CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL, CATE_SECTION_NAME, CATE_SECTION_LEVEL, CATE_VALUE, CATE_AUTH_NO from bi_category order by CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL , CATE_SECTION_LEVEL

select CATE_NO, CATE_DIVISION_NAME, CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL, CATE_SECTION_NAME, CATE_SECTION_LEVEL, CATE_VALUE, CATE_AUTH_NO from bi_category where CATE_SECTION_LEVEL = 1 order by CATE_DIVISION_LEVEL , CATE_SECTION_LEVEL
